verses.verse: Yet <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H3290>now,<s%> Jacob my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen.<s%>

This is what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3335>you,<s%> and formed you from the <S%H990>womb,<s%> who will <S%H5826>help<s%> you <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and <S%H3484>you,<s%> Jeshurun, whom I have <S%H977>chosen.<s%>

For I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> on him who is <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> and <S%H5140>streams<s%> on the dry <S%H3004>ground.<s%> I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> on your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on your <S%H6631>offspring:<s%>
and they will spring <S%H6779>up<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2682>grass,<s%> as <S%H6155>willows<s%> by <S%H4325>the<s%> <S%H2988>watercourses.<s%>

One will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'I am Yahweh's;' and another will be <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and another will <S%H3789>write<s%> with his <S%H3027%H99999>hand<s%> 'to Yahweh,' and <S%H3655>honor<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

This is what <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> "I am the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and I am the <S%H314>last;<s%> and <S%H1107>besides<s%> me there is no <S%H430>God.<s%>

Who is like <S%H7121>me?<s%> Who will call, and will <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H6186>it,<s%> and set it in order for <S%H7760>me,<s%> since I established the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> Let them <S%H5046>declare<s%> the things that are <S%H935>coming,<s%> and that will <S%H935>happen.<s%>

<S%H6342>Don't<s%> fear, neither be <S%H7297>afraid.<s%> <S%H5046>Haven't<s%> I declared it to you <S%H227>long<s%> <S%H5046>ago,<s%> and shown <S%H5707>it?<s%> You are my witnesses. Is <S%H3426>there<s%> a <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> <S%H3426>me?<s%> Indeed, there is <S%H3045>not.<s%> I don't know any other <S%H6697>Rock.<s%>"

Everyone who <S%H3335>makes<s%> an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> is <S%H8414>vain.<s%> The <S%H2530>things<s%> that they delight in will not <S%H3276>profit.<s%> Their own <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> <S%H7200>don't<s%> see, nor <S%H3045>know,<s%> that they may be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>
Who has <S%H3335>fashioned<s%> a <S%H410>god,<s%> or <S%H5258>molds<s%> an <S%H6459>image<s%> that is <S%H3276>profitable<s%> for <S%H1115>nothing?<s%>

<S%H2270>Behold,<s%> all his fellows will be <S%H954>disappointed;<s%> and the <S%H2796>workmen<s%> are mere <S%H120>men.<s%> Let them all be gathered <S%H6908>together.<s%> Let them stand <S%H5975>up.<s%> They will <S%H6342>fear.<s%> They will be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

The <S%H1270>blacksmith<s%> takes an <S%H4621>axe,<s%> <S%H6466>works<s%> in the <S%H6352>coals,<s%> <S%H3335>fashions<s%> it with <S%H4717>hammers,<s%> and <S%H6466>works<s%> it with his <S%H3581>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%> He is <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H369>fails;<s%> he <S%H8354>drinks<s%> no <S%H4325>water,<s%> and is <S%H3286>faint.<s%>

The <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> stretches <S%H5186>out<s%> a <S%H6957>line.<s%> He marks it <S%H8388>out<s%> with a <S%H8279>pencil.<s%> He <S%H6213>shapes<s%> it with <S%H4741>planes.<s%> He marks it <S%H8388>out<s%> with <S%H4230>compasses,<s%> and <S%H6213>shapes<s%> it like the <S%H8403>figure<s%> of a <S%H376>man,<s%> with the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> to <S%H3427>reside<s%> in a <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He cuts <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%> for <S%H3947>himself,<s%> and takes the <S%H8645>cypress<s%> and the <S%H437>oak,<s%> and <S%H553>strengthens<s%> for himself one among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest.<s%> He <S%H5193>plants<s%> a fir <S%H766>tree,<s%> and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> nourishes <S%H1431>it.<s%>

Then it will be for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H1197>burn;<s%> and he <S%H3947>takes<s%> some of <S%H2552>it,<s%> and warms <S%H1197>himself.<s%> Yes, he burns <S%H644>it,<s%> and bakes <S%H3899>bread.<s%> <S%H6466>Yes,<s%> he makes a <S%H410>god,<s%> and <S%H7812>worships<s%> <S%H6213>it;<s%> he makes it an engraved <S%H6459>image,<s%> and falls down to <S%H5456>it.<s%>

He <S%H8313>burns<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> of it <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire.<s%> With <S%H2677>part<s%> of <S%H398>it,<s%> he eats <S%H1320>meat.<s%> He <S%H6748>roasts<s%> a <S%H6740>roast,<s%> and is <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%> <S%H2552>Yes,<s%> he warms <S%H559>himself,<s%> and says, <S%H1889>"Aha!<s%> I am <S%H2552>warm.<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H217>fire.<s%>"

The <S%H7611>rest<s%> of it he <S%H6213>makes<s%> into a <S%H410>god,<s%> even his engraved <S%H6459>image.<s%> He bows <S%H5456>down<s%> to it and <S%H7812>worships,<s%> and <S%H6419>prays<s%> to <S%H559>it,<s%> and says, <S%H5337>"Deliver<s%> <S%H410>me;<s%> for you are my god!"

They <S%H3045>don't<s%> know, neither do they <S%H995>consider:<s%> for he has <S%H2902>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that they <S%H7200>can't<s%> see; and their <S%H3826>hearts,<s%> that they <S%H7919>can't<s%> understand.

No <S%H3820>one<s%> <S%H7725>thinks,<s%> neither is there <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> nor <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> "I have <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> of it <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire.<s%> <S%H644>Yes,<s%> I have also baked <S%H3899>bread<s%> on its <S%H1513>coals.<s%> I have <S%H6740>roasted<s%> <S%H1320>meat<s%> and <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H6213>it.<s%> Shall I make the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of it into an <S%H8441>abomination?<s%> Shall I bow <S%H5456>down<s%> to a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H944>trunk?<s%>"

He <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H665>ashes.<s%> A <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> has turned him <S%H5186>aside;<s%> and he <S%H5337>can't<s%> deliver his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> nor <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8267>"Isn't<s%> there a lie in my right <S%H3225>hand?<s%>"

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> these <S%H3290>things,<s%> Jacob and <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for you are my <S%H5650>servant.<s%> I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H5650>you.<s%> You are my servant. <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you will not be forgotten by <S%H5382>me.<s%>

I have blotted <S%H4229>out,<s%> as a thick <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> <S%H6051>and,<s%> as a cloud, your <S%H2403>sins.<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> to <S%H1350>me,<s%> for I have redeemed you.

<S%H7442>Sing,<s%> you <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7321>it!<s%> Shout, you lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth!<s%> Break <S%H6476>out<s%> into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> you <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> O <S%H3293>forest,<s%> all of your <S%H6086>trees,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and will <S%H6286>glorify<s%> himself in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> and he who <S%H3335>formed<s%> you from the <S%H990>womb:<s%> "I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H6213>makes<s%> all <S%H5186>things;<s%> who alone stretches out the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> who spreads <S%H5186>out<s%> the earth by <S%H776>myself;<s%>

who <S%H6565>frustrates<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> of the <S%H907>liars,<s%> and makes <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H1984>mad;<s%> who <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> men <S%H268>backward,<s%> and makes their <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H5528>foolish;<s%>

who <S%H6965>confirms<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H7999>performs<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of his <S%H4397>messengers;<s%> who <S%H559>says<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3427><s%> 'She will be inhabited;' and of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1129><s%> 'They will be built,' <S%H6965>and<s%> 'I will raise up its waste <S%H2723>places;<s%>'
who <S%H559>says<s%> to the <S%H6683>deep,<s%> <S%H2717><s%> 'Be dry,' <S%H3001>and<s%> 'I will dry up your <S%H5104>rivers;<s%>'

Who <S%H559>says<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus,<s%> <S%H7462><s%> 'He is my shepherd, and shall <S%H7999>perform<s%> all my <S%H2656>pleasure,<s%>' even <S%H559>saying<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1129><s%> 'She will be built;' and of the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> <S%H3245><s%> 'Your foundation will be laid.'"
